hints.content: We are looking for the sign of the sum of two negative numbers.

When we add two negative numbers, both numbers tell us to move to the left on the number line. 

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/68c2a5e8c9524b2fa1d8e2b681140c1823ee35ab)
The sign of the sum is negative because the sum is to the left of $0$.

choices.content: Neither positive nor negative—the sum is zero.
